text: Is there a way to set up the theme settings values via API?

I agree. As a potential solution, I'll toss out these ideas. 1 add single dropdown field called "section type" You could then define the section types in theme settings to apply a defined class. OR 2. treat DND sections, rows and columns were similar to modules, so you could add custom fields that would control options related to the theme.
added this to ideas in the community. <https://community.HubSpot.com/t5/HubSpot-Ideas/Theme-DND-section-custom-fields/idi-p/366377#M63822>

I added an idea earlier to the community to address item 1 as it's a huge pain for me with multiple brands and domains. <https://community.HubSpot.com/t5/HubSpot-Ideas/Theme-DND-section-custom-fields/idi-p/366377#M63822>
